comments: midterm and final are take home. She loves history but it is hard to pay attention in class. Few films we watched in class. i\'m sure if you find history intriguing, you might enjoy the class. If not, do not take for elective credit. If no other resort, i will say that she is easy going. fairly easy grader on the papers.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Very hard teacher. Hard because she is very scatter brained and jumps from topic to topic with no real segueway. She read from a paper throughout the whole semester and didn\'t make the class interesting at all. I am a good student and had a very hard time following her lectures. If you do take her class, be sure to take really good notes.

comments: I wish I had more than 350 characters. If your reading this, DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS. Absolutly horrible class. She treats this 100 level class like a 400 level class. comments: She\'s an ok prof.U need to take notes in her class if you want to pass the midterm.She gave us a 10 pg essay in the end of the semester.She put together a book that has a lot of readings & wants us to pick 3 and express what we thought about them.Her readings are dull & the class felt more like an English class.Her movies were boring & weird.
